comments:
Description:
Exception is thrown out when preview a report with a crosstab binding with no cubes.

Build number:
2.2.2.v20071116-1337

Steps to reproduce:
1. New a report with a crosstab binding to no cubes.
2. Preview.

Expected result:
No exception.

Actual result:
Exception is thrown out in log file under folder workspace\.metadata\.plugins\org.eclipse.birt.report.viewer\log

Error log:
